|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Per '''Ubiquiti''''s datasheet... *The dimensions of the board are ~ [[Dimensions::106.3 mm x 81.3 mm x 16.3162 mm|106.3 mm (L) x 81.3 mm (W) x 16.3162 mm (H)]]. ==Links of Interest== :[http://dl.ubnt.com/ls5_datasheet.pdf Datasheet] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Ubiquiti/LiteStation5 On the OpenWrt wiki] [http://www.ubnt.com/compliance Ubiquiti's FCC ID list] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|activation}} Supported by dd-wrt as of = Lite Station5 build Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/ubiquiti/ubiquiti_litestation5 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/picostation5 |forumpage = |support_started_version = 8.09 |current_supported_version = 10.03.1 }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== Per the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki... 
 1 (3.3)   2 (3.3)
 3 (RxD)   4 (RxD)
 5 (CTS)   6 (...)
 7 (RTS)   8 (...)
 9 (TxD)  10 (TxD)
11 (GND)  12 (GND)
